events.eventDescription: You can name your project in this section. You can also change who leads the procurement or add more colleagues to your project to help you evaluate suppliers.

eventTask.title: Change who is going to lead the procurement

events.eventDescription1: Add detail about what you require from a supplier, as well as setting a weighting for each requirement.
events.eventDescription2: You will need to decide how many suppliers you want to take to further competition, before reviewing suitable suppliers and choosing your next steps.

eventTask.title: Set your resources and vetting weightings
Choose your highest security and vetting requirements
Select your service capabilities and set the weighting
How much the team can grow (scale)
Where the work will be done
Select your supplier for direct award

events.eventDescription: You need to complete the previous “Choose your next steps” screen at the end of stage 1 to progress with the second stage of your direct award.

events.eventTitle: Upload pricing schedules and any other supporting documents
events.eventDescription: You will need to confirm if you require a contracted out service or a supply of resource.

eventTask.title: Confirm if you require a contracted out service or a supply of resource

events.eventTitle: Add Context to your direct award
events.p1: product road-maps and the expected life cycle of the product
events.p2: total cost of ownership, including running costs
events.p5: current and possible future scale of the requirement

events.eventTitle: Your assessment bases and evaluation weightings
events.eventDescription1: Decide and explain how you will assess and evaluate applications.
events.eventDescription2: When you build your criteria online, you'll be able to define your requirements and evaluation weightings as well.

eventTask.title: Set your assessment criteria and evaluation weightings

events.eventDescription: Review the information you've entered, ensuring that you have included all relevant context, requirements, evaluation criteria and weightings.

form.question1: Write and publish your bid pack for suppliers, who can then submit their responses and complete any other evaluation tasks.
form.question2: You will need to provide a clear set of criteria and explain how you will score responses.
